extracted_playbook.title: Update DTN Soft to v2.1
extracted_playbook.description: Delta Electronics recommends updating DTN Soft to version 2.1 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet by minimizing network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use secure methods like VPNs for remote access, ensuring VPNs are updated to the latest version and recognizing that VPN security depends on connected devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed on the CISA ICS webpage.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Clicking Unsolicited Links
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages to protect against social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Educate on Social Engineering and Phishing
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks to educate users.
